title: LADM VersionedObject class definition
description: The abstract class to manage and maintain historical data in the database.

beginLifespanVersion.description: Start time of a specific instance version

beginRealWorldLifespanVersion.description: Start valid time of a specific instance version

endLifespanVersion.description: End time of a specific instance version

endVRealWorldLifespanVersion.description: End valid time of a specific instance version
